tosdr.tldr: SparkNotes is only for personal, non-commercial use unless you have a business relationship with it.
tosdr.case: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
quoteText: SparkNotes grants User a limited, nonexclusive, revocable license to access and make personal, non-commercial use (unless User has a business relationship with SparkNotes) of the contents of the SparkNotes Site (“Content”).
